data.text: @zsk @timspector Dangerously short-sighted decisions are being made. Our government are pretending that Covid never existed, same as Russia and that's not gone well. MPs voted to scrap the NI rise this week. Gov ignore MPs. Public are appalled by our Home Office. We are not a working democracy

@zsk @timspector Yankee inu is a P2E (Play-to-Earn) blockchain-based game deployed on ERC network. 
Launching on March 25th🚀
🔥 Pre-sale Will Be Before Launch
✅2% Added to liquidity

@zsk @timspector Have they tried adding “Are you an oligarch?” to the questions? That might swing it.

@zsk @timspector Many people would really like to understand why this has happened. Acc to @timspector’s #YouTube it costs just 1% of @ONS #Covid_19 survey to run. Anything you or colleagues @BBCHughPym @BBCFergusWalsh could find out about @UKHSA @sajidjavid’s reasons wld be most appreciated thx.
@zsk @timspector As cases are on the rise....

@zsk @timspector I knew we had it. It was rife at my children’s school, and they had both just been told to isolate due to close contact. I had been 100% fine all through the year then suddenly had awful back pain and then cold symptoms. Would have had to lie to get the test without Zoe.
@zsk @timspector That is just so incredibly shortsighted

@zsk @timspector Just reading that. Very interesting turn of events. I wouldn’t have known that we all had Delta in our house Dec 2020 if hadn’t been for @timspector #ZoeCovid app; we weren’t eligible for NHS test as none of us had cough/fever/anosmia. My daily reporting on Zoe offered me one.

@zsk @timspector Zoe has been the one reliable, easy to understand and simply explained source of information on Covid over the last two years, often dispelling politically-charged commentary on all sides. Tim Spector has been a godsend, too. A real shame.
